input.sentences: husband prepared a surprise romantic dinner meal for their anniversary .
first course and side was a salad .
fish course for the main dish .
that was followed with a glass of vin soave .
finally they had chocolate and red wine for desert .
output.sentences: Today I had a romantic surprise prepared.
We started off with some salad.
We had a vin soave glass.
We ended our meal with some red wine finally.
